name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: A government scheme that provides income support to all landholding farmer families in the country.

name: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
description: A single portal for various scholarships offered by central and state governments.
eligibility: Varies by scholarship. Open to students from different backgrounds and levels.

name: Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Provides loans up to 10 Lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.
eligibility: Indian citizens looking to start or expand a small business.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: A scheme to issue 'Soil Health Cards' to farmers which will carry crop-wise recommendations of nutrients and fertilizers required.

name: Tractor Subsidy Scheme
description: Provides a subsidy for purchasing new tractors and other agricultural machinery to promote farm mechanization.
eligibility: Farmers with valid land records in Maharashtra.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: A government scheme that provides income support to all landholding farmer families in the country.

name: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
description: A single portal for various scholarships offered by central and state governments.
eligibility: Varies by scholarship. Open to students from different backgrounds and levels.

name: Solar Pump Scheme (PM-KUSUM)
description: Scheme to provide subsidies on solar-powered irrigation pumps to reduce reliance on diesel.
eligibility: Individual farmers, groups of farmers, co-operatives.
